abstract: The Google platform surpassed Apple’s smartphone in new subscribers, according to a report by Nielsen, a market trends monitor.
snippet: The Google platform surpassed Apple’s smartphone in new subscribers, according to a report by Nielsen, a market trends monitor.
lead_paragraph: By the end of 2011, there could be more smartphones in the United States than the less advanced feature phones, according to a report released Monday by the Nielsen Company, a market trends monitor.

headline.main: Android Beats iPhone With New Subscribers

abstract: In an interview with Mike Cassidy, Google’s new director of product management, USA Today calls the entrepreneur “The Start-Up King of Silicon Valley.”
snippet: In an interview with Mike Cassidy, Google’s new director of product management, USA Today calls the entrepreneur “The Start-Up King of Silicon Valley.”
lead_paragraph: In an interview with Mike Cassidy, Google‘s new director of product management, USA Today calls the entrepreneur “The Start-Up King of Silicon Valley.”
